sentences.en: "I don't follow football," she said with an apologetic smile.
Football clubs have been busy in the close season transfer market.
sentences.cn: 足球俱乐部在休赛季节的转会市场上一直忙个不停。

sentences.en: Gary plays football with the other children of the same age.
sentences.cn: 加里和其他同龄的孩子们一起踢足球。

sentences.en: He said he was going to improve his football.
sentences.cn: 他说他要提高足球技术。

sentences.en: I always wanted to have a go at football.
sentences.cn: 我一直都想试试踢足球。

sentences.en: I think I saw her, fleetingly, at a football match.
sentences.cn: 我想我在一场足球赛上匆匆见过她一次。

sentences.en: I think you ought to give football a rest for a time.
sentences.cn: 我认为你应该暂时停止踢足球。

sentences.en: It won't shake the football world if we beat Torquay.
sentences.cn: 即便我们击败了托基队也不能撼动足球界。

sentences.en: Italian football captured the imagination of the nation last season.
sentences.cn: 上个赛季意大利足球吸引了全国上下的注意。

sentences.en: kids playing football in the street
My Dad took me to watch my first football match .
sentences.cn: 爸爸带我去看了我人生第一场足球比赛。

sentences.en: The England team were a poor advertisement for European football tonight.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队今晚为欧洲足球做了一次糟糕的宣传。

sentences.en: There are other forms of civil disorder — most notably, football hooliganism.
sentences.cn: 还有其他形式的民众骚乱，最出名的是足球流氓行为。

sentences.en: This year'snational college football championship was won by Princeton.
sentences.cn: 今年全国高校橄榄球锦标赛的冠军是普林斯顿队。

sentences.en: To stay fit off season, I play tennis or football.
sentences.cn: 为了在休赛期间保持状态，我常打网球或踢足球。

sentences.en: Two blocks beyond our school was a field where boys played football.
sentences.cn: 离我们学校两个街区远的地方有个男孩们玩橄榄球的球场。

sentences.en: Which football team do you support?
With football, it was just something that came naturally to me.
sentences.cn: 说起踢足球，对我来说再容易不过。

words.tran_cn: 足球运动员；橄榄球运动员

trans.tran_cn: 足球〔美国通常指橄榄球〕，足球运动，屡屡引起争论（或分歧）的问题，被踢来踢去的难题
trans.tran_en: a game played by two teams of eleven players who try to kick a round ball into the other team’s  goal
